job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongAbout UsstrongppbrppOur mission is to make education accessible and over the last two decades Studycom has become the leading online education platform deliveringnbspanbsppersonalized learning experience across a broad continuum of education for over 30 million students instructors and professionals every monthppbrppAs a member of the Studycom team youll help empower millions of learners to achieve their education and career goals We focus on increasing access to education because we know information is the ultimate equalizer and that education is key to upward mobility Every minute a learner enrolls in a course and our College Accelerator solution Studycom has collectively saved students 132 million in college tuitionppbrppYoull also be part of a company dedicated to contributing to society Studycom has donated 23 million inkind value across social impact programs including matching employee contributions to nonprofit organizations and millions to help schools during the pandemicppbrppAt Studycom we know that strong communities are built on the power of our diversity and we respect and strive to understand for the diverse identities race ethnicities backgrounds and perspectives of our team members And our work and company culture have been consistently recognized includingppbrpulliInc Best Place to WorkliliFortune Great Places to Work  Best Workplaces in the Bay ArealiliGolden Bridge Awards  Gold Winner Corporate Social ResponsibilityliliSan Francisco Business Times amp Silicon Valley Business Journal  Best Places to WorkliulpbrppAtnbspStudycom our strongSoftware Engineersstrong help our crossfunctional teams rally around common goals and deliver valuable features frequently  sometimes multiple times a day Our Full Stack Engineers work on the front and backend emphasizing collaboration learning and fast feedback including pair programming and regular constructive code reviews We invest in our engineers growth which reflects and reinforces our mission to make education accessibleppbrppCome join us on our mission and make a differenceppbrppstrongAbout the Software Engineer PositionstrongppbrppWe are looking for a talented flexible Software Engineer to join one of our crossfunctional teams at StudycomppbrppThe ideal Software Engineer will have experiencenbspppbrpulliDelivering endtoend website features and solutions across the application stack in an iterative mannernbspliliCollaborating on a crossfunctional team to deliver against a product road mapliliParticipating in brainstormsessions design discussions code reviews and automated test developmentliliTaking initiative to get questions answered unblock ongoing development and make everyone on your team successfulliulpbrppRequirementsppbrpulli3 years experience doing backend development with Javalili3 years experience with frontend web application development using modern HTML CSS and JavaScriptliliHave experience working with objectoriented design relational databases data structures and multithreaded algorithmsliliBS or MS in Computer Science or related fieldliliSelfmotivated detailoriented and strong analytical  problem solving skillsliliDesire to work in a collaborative teambased environment built around ScrumliulpbrppPreferred RequirementsppbrpulliProfessional experience with a modern front end javascript framework ie ReactFlux or AngularliliExperience building and deploying mobile apps in a modern app development framework ie Ionic Flutter or React NativeliliProfessional experience with Machine learning Data Analysis SQL query optimization and tuning MySQL preferredliliHad exposure with online marketing search engine optimization andor lead generationliulpbrppstrongPlease Note Our primary concern is for the health and wellbeing of our employees as well as candidates Given ongoing COVID concerns new employees are being onboarded and working remotely Once we return to the office this position will be located in our office in Mountain View CAnbspnbspStudycom will be implementing a hybrid model that will include both inoffice and remote workstrongppbrppstrongIn addition Studycom will be requiring all employees be fully vaccinated as a condition of employment If an accommodation is required please speak with a member of the People TeamstrongppbrppstrongLife at StudycomstrongppbrppAt Studycom youll join an Agile team making a big impact in a crossfunctional collaborative environment where team members wear different hats and regularly interact with senior leadership We get things done and move quicklyppbrppStudycoms team members together with our Study Studio network of instructors tutors subject matter experts video animators and editors have developed 15 million learning resources on our platform This includes microlessons videos flashcards lesson plans worksheets and more fueling 16 million hours of learning engagement a yearppbrppWe are in the heart of downtown Mountain View just a few steps from the Caltrain station And regardless if we are in the office or sheltered at home we have comprehensive health and wellness benefits We offer ongoing education and professional growth opportunities including a lifelong membership to Studycom You can also expectppbrpulli100 paid health vision and dental insurance for employeeslili401k with employer matchlili20  30 PTO days each year increases with tenurelili10 paid holidaysliliWork at home setup stipendliliCompanysponsored gym membershipsliliFree Caltrain PassliliTuition reimbursement and gift matching programsliulpbrppemspan classqlcursorspanStudycom provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin age veteran or disability status In addition to federal law requirements Studycom complies with applicable state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilitiesnbspAdditionally qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records will be considered for the position in accordance with applicable state and local lawsemp
